item.title: Chia seed Jam (To finish)
item.description: Difficulty: easy Time: 10 minutes Ingredients Jam: Fruits (e.g. Raspberries, Blueberries) Chia seed Optional: Agave syrup (1 tsp) Lemon Vanilla Extract Almond Extract Instructions: Heat the fruits in a pan until broken down. Add the chia seeds, syrup, lemon and extracts.
